Fwd Re EnronFlorida Power Light Company ISDA agreementsfrom postmasterenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Mon Oct Received from nahoumsmswpxcorpenroncom by postmasterenroncom postmaster with ESMTP id MAA for Mon Oct CDT From Received from enemtaenroncom unverified by nahoumsmswpxcorpenroncom Content Technologies SMTPRS with ESMTP id Mon Oct Subject Re EnronFlorida Power Light Company ISDA agreements To Serge Martin Cc XMailer Lotus Notes Release March MessageID Date Mon Oct XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on ENEMTAEnronRelease Intl March at AM MIMEVersion Contenttype multipartmixed BoundaryEFBfeadfcEFB ContentDisposition inline Serge The revisions look fine Call me if you have any questions Clement Serge Martin To teelhec cc torcom Subject EnronFlorida Power Light Company ISDA agreements PM Clement Enclosed in re the EnronFPL ISDA agreements is the revised guaranty we discussed today Please let me know if the revisions meet with your approval so Sara and I can proceed to finalize this and the related agreements as well as prepare the corresponding agreements for Enron and FPL Energy Power Marketing Inc the nonregulated FPL affiliate we discussed Thank you Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida phone fax See attached file DOC DOC

Project Cc your review please find initial drafts of the following documents in connection with the abovereferenced transactions Wind River Consent to Assignment to be executed by Barclays Bank PLC which reflects the consent of Barclays to the assignment by Enron Corp of the Sponsor Guarantee Release Agreement to be executed by Lost Creek and ENA which reflects Lost Creeks release of ENA under the Firm Gathering Agreement Powder River Omnibus Consent to be executed by BankBoston NA and Credit Lyonnais which approves the assignment by Enron Corp of the Sponsor Guarantee and the termination of the ENA Consent to Assignment Termination of Consent to Assignment to be executed by BankBoston NA and ENA which terminates the ENA Consent to Assignment Release Agreement to be executed by Fort Union and ENA which reflects Fort Unions release of ENA under the Firm Gathering Agreement Should you have any comments or questions regarding any of the attached documents please do not hesitate to call me at Jason Peters ConsenttDOC ConsenttDOC TerminatDOC MutualReDOC MutualReDOC

Arizona Public Service CompanyThe following items are outstanding issues with respect to the abovereferenced ISDA Arizona Public Service Company plans on executing the ISDA as Arizona Public Service Company on behalf of its Bulk Power Marketing Resource Operations Division BPMROD It is APSCs intent in the future to create a new entity for this division such new entity to enter into all trading transactions As a result it is ASPCs desire to modify the definition of Specified Transaction to only include transactions between Party A and BPMROD Procedures for Entering into Transactions ASPC would like days to dispute or accept confirmations Apparently all of their agreements provide for days therefore any shorter time period could cause problems for them I had previously offered days Part f Recording ASPC wants to consent to recordings on trading lines only They do not want to consent to officers nontraders being recorded if the communication does not occur on a trading line Part gB Setoff ASPC wants to delete or any of its Affiliates from this section ASPC thinks this issue is related to their issue in above I dont see why What do you think I assume that we are not willing to strike or any of its Affiliates The only other issue is a credit issue which I am handling with Paul Radous So were close Let me know what you think Jason

Re Arizona Public Service CompanyMy phone is Fax is I do have voice mail at Enron I am definitely up for more work Ive got a meeting at so Ill call you later this morning Jason AM Hi Jason Please send me your phone and fax Do you still have voice mail over here Regarding your message I have asked Paul to consider items and since each bears upon credit Ill get back to you On a different note how would you like some more work Call when youre free Sara JASON PETERS ndrews To kurthcom cc Subject Arizona Public Service Company PM Sara The following items are outstanding issues with respect to the abovereferenced ISDA Arizona Public Service Company plans on executing the ISDA as Arizona Public Service Company on behalf of its Bulk Power Marketing Resource Operations Division BPMROD It is APSCs intent in the future to create a new entity for this division such new entity to enter into all trading transactions As a result it is ASPCs desire to modify the definition of Specified Transaction to only include transactions between Party A and BPMROD Procedures for Entering into Transactions ASPC would like days to dispute or accept confirmations Apparently all of their agreements provide for days therefore any shorter time period could cause problems for them I had previously offered days Part f Recording ASPC wants to consent to recordings on trading lines only They do not want to consent to officers nontraders being recorded if the communication does not occur on a trading line Part gB Setoff ASPC wants to delete or any of its Affiliates from this section ASPC thinks this issue is related to their issue in above I dont see why What do you think I assume that we are not willing to strike or any of its Affiliates The only other issue is a credit issue which I am handling with Paul Radous So were close Let me know what you think Jason
BuySideDirectThe BuySideDirect Agreement prohibits access of their system from outside the US without their prior written consent Is this an issue for us Jason

Fwd HarvardEnron ISDAfrom postmasterenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Fri Aug Received from mailmanenroncom mailmanenroncom by postmasterenroncom postmaster with ESMTP id NAA for Fri Aug CDT Received from dservectenroncom dservectenroncom by mailmanenroncom corp with ESMTP id eBInGH for Fri Aug CDT Received from notesectenroncom ecthougtcorpenroncom by dservectenroncom with SMTP id NAA for Fri Aug CDT Received by notesectenroncomLotus SMTP MTA v id Fri Aug XLotusFromDomain ECT From John Suttle To MessageID Date Fri Aug Subject HarvardEnron ISDA MimeVersion Contenttype multipartmixed BoundarysMfZvhpgsZzkpgQIqabtmydRYJTQVLUybhpLGeiVPfYZqfVlc ContentDisposition inline Forwarded by John SuttleHOUECT on PM Diggins Timothy W on PM To cc Kimberly J Noble Email Subject HarvardEnron ISDA Attached are revised drafts of the proposed Schedule and Addendum marked to show changes from the most recent draft you reviewed I believe that we have implemented most of the changes you suggested Although I have discussed most of the changes with Kim Noble she may have additional or different thoughts We are still in the process of reviewing the form of Enron guaranty and will come back to you with comments shortly We look forward to hearing from you at your early convenience Best regards DOC DOC See attached file DOC See attached file DOC DOC DOC

PrimeTrade License AgreementI just wanted to remind you that you had my comments to the abovereferenced agreement and that I was not going to send comments out until you had reviewed them Thanks Jason

Lotus Notes Cc Please make the following updates to Lotus Notes Brokerage Agreements BuySideDirect Phone Conference w M Minnich and MFowler re Outstanding Issues Governing Law Arbitration Consequential Damages and Submission to Jurisdiction Frost Securities ENA Comments Rejected Call placed to Terry Finn ING Barings Called Mark Seffinger Mark wont be back in the office until Lehman Brothers Called Karen Brown to follow up She is still waiting on her legal department Jeffries Company Inc Left message with Bob Eisner to followup Thanks Jason

Lotus Notes Cc Please make the following additions to Lotus Notes Brokerage Agreements BuySideDirect Phone conference with Mike Minnich re Governing Law and Submision to Jurisdiction issues M Minnich to get back to us Called Anthony at WPG re Limitation of Liability in Prime Brokerage Agreemen and left a voice mail Limitrader Left voice mail with Jim Copley re Outstanding Issues Thanks Jason

Fwd Online Trading Sitesresponded to Mike by phone Received from nahoulncorpenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Wed Sep Subject Online Trading Sites To JASON PETERS Cc Bcc From Date Wed Sep MessageID XPriority Normal XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on NAHOULNEnronRelease Intl July at AM MIMEVersion Contenttype textplain charsetusascii I continue to be asked daily by our trading group as to the status of the online trading sites Therefore any updates you can provide regarding the agreements would be appreciated Buy Side Direct Have you provided Mike Minnich with a revised markedup copy of the Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearing Services which incorporates my suggested changes Could I get a copy Has Sara developed a framework regarding notification ie who how lead time which she will propose for all sites Are you and Sara comfortable with Mike Minnichs proposal regarding jurisdiction Per Mikes email he wanted to discuss the issue of consequential damages Has this issue been resolved Trading Edge Are you encountering resistance regarding any issues you and Dan Brooks have been discussing LIMITrader Have you been able to email the electronic version of agreements back to Jim Kopley with our comments If so could I get a copy I just learned from our sales person Doug Ford that Jim Kopley may no longer be the appropriate contact with LIMITrader I will email you additional information when I hear back from Doug Regarding Trading Edge and LIMITrader do you know if we will be required to execute an Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearing Services If so I assume we will propose the modified version that we will execute with Buy Side Direct Any feedback on these comments and any estimate you can provide in terms of when well be done with these sites would be appreciated Please let me know if you would like to discuss or if I can assist with any issues Thanks Mike

Fwd Blackline vs LIMITrader Securities Inc Subscriber AgreementYouve already seen these comments Limitrader requested that insert our comments into the document They had trouble reviewing our fax Let me know if I can throw you a life preserver Ive got some extra time if you need help on anything Jason Received from nahoulncorpenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Wed Sep Subject Blackline vs LIMITrader Securities Inc Subscriber Agreement To Cc Bcc From Date Wed Sep MessageID XPriority Normal XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on NAHOULNEnronRelease Intl July at AM MIMEVersion Contenttype multipartmixed BoundaryanECLTOTGpCTcJForOglIuwjrUXrgSUwbVPONLSOcgop ContentDisposition inline Attached is the LIMITrader agreement with our proposed changes We may also have comments regarding the OMNI Letter with Documents form and the QIB letter Thanks Mike Forwarded by Mike FowlerCorpEnron on AM JASON PETERS on AM To cc Subject Blackline vs LIMITrader Securities Inc Subscriber Agreement Per our conversation See attached file BlacklinDOC BlacklinDOC

Fwd enrsidedocfrom nahoulncorpenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Fri Sep Subject enrsidedoc To Cc Bcc From Date Fri Sep MessageID XPriority Normal XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on NAHOULNEnronRelease Intl July at PM MIMEVersion Contenttype multipartmixed BoundaryXmNQVCiWOhoxITAMeLCSUiWZtndYOQCajGYTebEFOFxWEix ContentDisposition inline Trading Edges response to our comments Forwarded by Mike FowlerCorpEnron on AM Jay Mortenson radingEdgecom on PM To cc Subject enrsidedoc enrsidedoc enrsidedoc See attached file enrsidedoc enrsidedoc

Fwd Trading EdgeReceived from postmasterenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Tue Oct Received from nahoumsmswpxcorpenroncom by postmasterenroncom postmaster with ESMTP id NAA for Tue Oct CDT From Received from nahoulncorpenroncom unverified by nahoumsmswpxcorpenroncom Content Technologies SMTPRS with ESMTP id for Tue Oct Subject Trading Edge To Date Tue Oct MessageID XPriority Normal XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on NAHOULNEnronRelease Intl July at PM MIMEVersion Contenttype textplain charsetusascii The language you had Buy Side Direct add to section their agreement very clearly describes the role of BSD and their clearing firm BSD is the Subscribers counterparty until trade affirmation After trade affirmation BSDs clearing firm is responsible for the clearance and settlement of all affirmed trades executed on the BSD trading system Section The Trading Edge agreement states that all trades are executed by Trading Edge on a riskless principal basis Does this language clearly indicate that our credit exposure is to Trading Edge until trades are affirmed If not can we ask Trading Edge to incorporate language similar to the above statement from the BSD agreement Thanks Mike
HarvardKim Noble called She was hoping that we could talk in the morning She indicated that anything before AM worked for her I told her I would pass it on Jason

Re Harvardcall you at am to see if your available PM Jason She did call and wanted John you and me I am available untill roughly am when the lawyers depart for the Woodlands She indicated that this provision was necessary if we EVER decided to net physicalfinancial Jason we wont agree to that now and if we ever did I am sure we would either amend all of our masters or put a separate netting agreement in place She did indicate that Harvard MIGHT drop the request I dont particularly want the provision in the agreement My calendar is open if you want to schedule SS JASON PETERS ndrews To kurthcom cc Subject Harvard PM Sara Kim Noble called She was hoping that we could talk in the morning She indicated that anything before AM worked for her I told her I would pass it on Jason

Enron Corp Guaranty Midcoast Marketing Inc Cc Pursuant to Sara Shackletons request attached for your review please find a blacklined copy of the Enron Corp Guaranty marked to show requested changes by the abovereferenced counterparty in connection with the negotiation of a Master ISDA Agreement between ENA and Midcoast Marketing Inc Should you have any comments or questions please call me at I have been advised that this ISDA is considered a Top by ENAs credit department therefore your attention to this matter is greatly appreciated Thanks Jason BlacklinDOC

Terms of Business between ITGL and ENA Cc Pursuant to our earlier conversation I have the following questions which relate to the Financial Services Authoritys Conduct of Business rules The Agreement provides that the Broker may from time to time effect transactions with or for ENA in NonReadily Realisable Investments as defined in the Rules I presume this is acceptable but please confirm The Agreement provides that the protections in the Rules on giving suitable advice will not apply Again I presume this is acceptable since we will probably not be using their advice but please confirm The Agreement provides that Any monies arising in the normal course of business will be held by our agent in accordance with the Financial Services Regulations and the relevant rules of FSA Please confirm that this is acceptable The Agreement provides that it shall be governed by English law and that ENA submits to the nonexclusive jurisdiction of the English courts I know that ENA has specific policies in the US relating to governing law and submission to jurisdiction Please confirm with me that the abovereferenced provision is acceptable Thanks Jason
EnronFPL ISDA Cc I just wanted to get an update on when you thought we would have a response regarding the abovereferenced ISDA Thanks Jason Peters

Re EnronFPL ISDAwaiting for Mark Taylors approval AM Do you have access to Lotus Notes Serge told us on Oct that he would have comments no later thatn the week of and you would follow up with him Ill try to call you when I have a free minute Sara JASON PETERS ndrews To kurthcom cc Subject EnronFPL ISDA PM Serge I just wanted to get an update on when you thought we would have a response regarding the abovereferenced ISDA Thanks Jason Peters

Re SIA Form mandatory arbitrationTechnology Group Limited ITGL Ive emailed twice and phone once Lotus Notes The software has been loaded on my computer but it crashes my system Ive been told that it should be resolved today AM Jason Which files have you left messages for Mark Elliott Have you emailed and phoned Are you up and running on Lotus Notes SS JASON PETERS ndrews To kurthcom cc Subject Re SIA Form mandatory arbitration PM I have a message into Mark Seffinger at ING Barings with respect to item I left a message with Mark Elliott I still have not heard from him PM Jason You were going to verify whether or not arbitration for the executing brokers is mandatory Have you heard anything Did you ever speak with Mark Elliott about ITG Are you still having problems connecting with him Sara

Fwd Terms of Business between ITGL and ENA Cc Per Sara Shackletons request please review the attached email that I had previously sent to Mark Elliott with respect to a brokerage agreement between ENA and Investment Technology Group Limited and let me know if you are able to respond Should you have any comments or questions please call me at or Sara at Thanks Jason Peters ContentTransferEncoding quotedprintable Date Tue Oct From JASON PETERS To Cc Subject Terms of Business between ITGL and ENA MimeVersion ContentType textplain charsetUSASCII ContentDisposition inline Mark Pursuant to our earlier conversation I have the following questions which relate to the Financial Services Authoritys Conduct of Business rules The Agreement provides that the Broker may from time to time effect transactions with or for ENA in NonReadily Realisable Investments as defined in the Rules I presume this is acceptable but please confirm The Agreement provides that the protections in the Rules on giving suitable advice will not apply Again I presume this is acceptable since we will probably not be using their advice but please confirm The Agreement provides that Any monies arising in the normal course of business will be held by our agent in accordance with the Financial Services Regulations and the relevant rules of FSA Please confirm that this is acceptable The Agreement provides that it shall be governed by English law and that ENA submits to the nonexclusive jurisdiction of the English courts I know that ENA has specific policies in the US relating to governing law and submission to jurisdiction Please confirm with me that the abovereferenced provision is acceptable Thanks Jason

Fwd BuySideDirect AgreementReceived from mailbuysidedirectcom wzsjccadslcncnet by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Thu Oct Received from pc pcbuysidedirectcom by mailbuysidedirectcom buysidedirect with SMTP id LAA Thu Oct PDT From Lisa OConnor To Cc Mike Minnnich Subject BuySideDirect Agreement Date Thu Oct MessageID MIMEVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartCFEFBF XPriority Normal XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook IMO Build Importance Normal XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Dear Jason Enclosed is the BuySideDirect agreement complete with the revisions that we discussed Rgds Lisa Lisa Mears OConnor CFA BuySideDirect LLC a subsidiary of Intelligent Markets Inc Phone Fax Enron BuySideDirect Subscriber Agreement Dated August doc

Fwd BuySideDirectReceived from mailbuysidedirectcom wzsjccadslcncnet by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Fri Oct Received from pc pcbuysidedirectcom by mailbuysidedirectcom buysidedirect with SMTP id LAA Fri Oct PDT From Lisa OConnor To Cc Mike Minnnich Subject BuySideDirect Date Fri Oct MessageID MIMEVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartCEA XPriority Normal XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook IMO Build XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Importance Normal Dear Jason Getting back to you on the points still outstanding on the BuySideDirect agreement comma not a period on the th line Change included Addition of following language Change included In the event that any component of a BSD executed trade is deemed Clearly Erroneous by BuySideDirect the NASD or any ATS or ECN through which BuySideDirect executes trades the entire BSD trade including both bond and equity components on all sides of the trade will be cancelled Enclosed are Broker Dealer Attachments Modification of previous language Change included After trade affirmation BuySideDirect shall cause its clearing firm to be responsible for the clearance and settlement of all affirmed trades executed on the BuySideDirect trading system You requested the phrase at Subscribers election which we have not included Consequential You also requested the deletion of the term consequential from sections and We would like to keep the language as is in sections and Please give me a call if you would like to discuss the document further You can reach me at Thanks Regards Lisa OConnor Lisa Mears OConnor CFA BuySideDirect LLC a subsidiary of Intelligent Markets Inc Phone Fax BSD BD Attachment DOC BuySideDirect Attachment DOC Enron BuySideDirect Subscriber Agreement Dated August doc

Re ITGPosit Europehave faxed you my comments Nocomments have been distributed to the other side PM please let me know by the end of the day today thanks ss Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM Sara Shackleton To cc Subject ITGPosit Europe AM Jason Please let me know where we stand on this and what steps we are currently taking to finalize On a different matter I spoke with Mike Neves on Friday afternoon and we concluded that getting you hooked up to Lotus Notes was becoming too complicated Please email your updates to me and I will enter onto Lotus Notes Thanks Sara PS I have approved all of your invoices for payment Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM John Greene To Sara CT cc AM Subject ITGPosit Europe Sara Where do we stand on the contractual issues associated with getting this software installed on our desktops Thanks and regards John

Re Arizona Public Service CompanyMy phone is Fax is I do have voice mail at Enron I am definitely up for more work Ive got a meeting at so Ill call you later this morning Jason AM Hi Jason Please send me your phone and fax Do you still have voice mail over here Regarding your message I have asked Paul to consider items and since each bears upon credit Ill get back to you On a different note how would you like some more work Call when youre free Sara JASON PETERS ndrews To kurthcom cc Subject Arizona Public Service Company PM Sara The following items are outstanding issues with respect to the abovereferenced ISDA Arizona Public Service Company plans on executing the ISDA as Arizona Public Service Company on behalf of its Bulk Power Marketing Resource Operations Division BPMROD It is APSCs intent in the future to create a new entity for this division such new entity to enter into all trading transactions As a result it is ASPCs desire to modify the definition of Specified Transaction to only include transactions between Party A and BPMROD Procedures for Entering into Transactions ASPC would like days to dispute or accept confirmations Apparently all of their agreements provide for days therefore any shorter time period could cause problems for them I had previously offered days Part f Recording ASPC wants to consent to recordings on trading lines only They do not want to consent to officers nontraders being recorded if the communication does not occur on a trading line Part gB Setoff ASPC wants to delete or any of its Affiliates from this section ASPC thinks this issue is related to their issue in above I dont see why What do you think I assume that we are not willing to strike or any of its Affiliates The only other issue is a credit issue which I am handling with Paul Radous So were close Let me know what you think Jason

Fwd Terms of Business between ITGL and ENA Cc Per Sara Shackletons request please review the attached email that I had previously sent to Mark Elliott with respect to a brokerage agreement between ENA and Investment Technology Group Limited and let me know if you are able to respond Should you have any comments or questions please call me at or Sara at Thanks Jason Peters ContentTransferEncoding quotedprintable Date Tue Oct From JASON PETERS To Cc Subject Terms of Business between ITGL and ENA MimeVersion ContentType textplain charsetUSASCII ContentDisposition inline Mark Pursuant to our earlier conversation I have the following questions which relate to the Financial Services Authoritys Conduct of Business rules The Agreement provides that the Broker may from time to time effect transactions with or for ENA in NonReadily Realisable Investments as defined in the Rules I presume this is acceptable but please confirm The Agreement provides that the protections in the Rules on giving suitable advice will not apply Again I presume this is acceptable since we will probably not be using their advice but please confirm The Agreement provides that Any monies arising in the normal course of business will be held by our agent in accordance with the Financial Services Regulations and the relevant rules of FSA Please confirm that this is acceptable The Agreement provides that it shall be governed by English law and that ENA submits to the nonexclusive jurisdiction of the English courts I know that ENA has specific policies in the US relating to governing law and submission to jurisdiction Please confirm with me that the abovereferenced provision is acceptable Thanks Jason

Enron Corp Guaranty Midcoast Marketing Inc Cc Pursuant to Sara Shackletons request attached for your review please find a blacklined copy of the Enron Corp Guaranty marked to show requested changes by the abovereferenced counterparty in connection with the negotiation of a Master ISDA Agreement between ENA and Midcoast Marketing Inc Should you have any comments or questions please call me at I have been advised that this ISDA is considered a Top by ENAs credit department therefore your attention to this matter is greatly appreciated Thanks Jason BlacklinDOC

Fwd Online Trading Sitesresponded to Mike by phone Received from nahoulncorpenroncom outboundenroncom by tfsgatewayandrewskurthcom Wed Sep Subject Online Trading Sites To JASON PETERS Cc Bcc From Date Wed Sep MessageID XPriority Normal XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on NAHOULNEnronRelease Intl July at AM MIMEVersion Contenttype textplain charsetusascii I continue to be asked daily by our trading group as to the status of the online trading sites Therefore any updates you can provide regarding the agreements would be appreciated Buy Side Direct Have you provided Mike Minnich with a revised markedup copy of the Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearing Services which incorporates my suggested changes Could I get a copy Has Sara developed a framework regarding notification ie who how lead time which she will propose for all sites Are you and Sara comfortable with Mike Minnichs proposal regarding jurisdiction Per Mikes email he wanted to discuss the issue of consequential damages Has this issue been resolved Trading Edge Are you encountering resistance regarding any issues you and Dan Brooks have been discussing LIMITrader Have you been able to email the electronic version of agreements back to Jim Kopley with our comments If so could I get a copy I just learned from our sales person Doug Ford that Jim Kopley may no longer be the appropriate contact with LIMITrader I will email you additional information when I hear back from Doug Regarding Trading Edge and LIMITrader do you know if we will be required to execute an Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearing Services If so I assume we will propose the modified version that we will execute with Buy Side Direct Any feedback on these comments and any estimate you can provide in terms of when well be done with these sites would be appreciated Please let me know if you would like to discuss or if I can assist with any issues Thanks Mike
